text: Grand Park Hotel is a hotel located in downtown Mandalay, Myanmar. The 31-story tower is the tallest building in the country outside of Yangon. The hotel was partially opened, with 302 rooms available in September 2019, and with another 92 rooms to be ready by December 2019. ==Notes== ==References== ==Bibliography== * Category:Buildings and structures in Mandalay Category:Hotels in Myanmar Category:Buildings and structures completed in 2019 Category:2019 establishments in Myanmar
title: Grand Park Hotel, Mandalay
